:::{#hero-heading}

I’m a freelance creator specializing in interactive dashboards, automated reports, custom packages, and tailored workshops using R and Python, working under the [Tidy Intelligence](https://www.tidy-intelligence.com/) brand.

I co-created the open-source projects [Tidy Finance](https://www.tidy-finance.org/) and [EconDataverse](https://www.econdataverse.org/) to foster reproducible research in finance and economics. 

I'm affiliated with the Finance Group at [Humboldt-University of Berlin](https://www.wiwi.hu-berlin.de/en/Professorships/bwl/finance) and Data Editor at the [Review of Financial Studies](https://review-of-financial-studies.github.io/).
